					### ENV ###

	-- Test[2] --

INPUT=env wrong_opt

	-- RETURN VALUE --
env: ‘wrong_opt’: No such file or directory
---->[OK]

	-- EXIT STATUS --
MINISHELL=127
BASH=127
---->[OK]

	-- VALGRIND --
